name: CDTM Hackathon
description: A 2 day hackathon in munich to build AI agents to automate real world processes end-to-end. The team works 36 hours to come up with an idea, business case and to build a prototype until late at night. All will lead to a final pitch to present the idea, technology and the business case to a jury of experts.
goal: Build a working version of an AI agent faciliating real-time feedback and culture mining in a company.

team.name: Vishwa Singh
team.responsibilities: Building the frontend to show the dashboard with the employee profile and the analytics of the feedback.

team.name: Johannes Michalke
team.responsibilities: Building the backend to store the feedback and the analytics.

team.name: Fabian Hildesheim
team.responsibilities: Faciliating a good team spirit, owning the video production for the final submission and sharpening the business case.

team.name: Joshua Kraft
team.responsibilities: Creating test data and prompt engineering for the AI agents.

updates.description: We had a long brainstroming session on friday to come up with the idea for the hackathon. We pitched our ideas to the judges and got feedback on them.
We built the prototype of the AI agent and the backend to store the feedback. We also created a frontend to show the dashboard with the employee profile and the analytics of the feedback.
